snippet.description: Yes, it seems that I am already counting down the days until my son's first day of kindergarten. Just last week we received a letter from the school informing us that our first-born will be in the afternoon kindergarten...

snippet.title: Deviled Eggs
snippet.description: The deviled egg is a mainstay at picnics or holiday get-togethers, and can be dressed up or down to fit almost any budget. Get Anne Coleman's classic recipe, here.
